reviews.review: half life 3
Game That Deserves a Sequel
但愿有生之年能看见半条命3吧!
What could have been the ending to a great franchise, was just another cliffhanger in regular valve fashion
Why end a game in a cliffhanger when you aren't going to continue the story?????
Валв, ГДЕ HALF-LIFE 3?!?!?!?
¿dónde está HL3?

You know this game already.  It is a part of you.  You wish it would continue.  You are angry at the foolish decision to abandon a huge niche, all with cash-in-hand, ready to enrich any devs brave enough to complete our story.

• Send us to the ship,
• give us a gravity gun with portal capabilities, and
• let modders create additional lands and quests.

Valve, sell the IP you've abandoned to Bethesda … then get out of their way.
Nominated for Deserves a Sequel prize in 2017 Steam Awards.
I too nominate this game as the game that needs a sequel award. Vote "Yes" Australia :)

Последнее шедевральное творение Valve ( не считая Portal 2) Невозможно вспоминать без слез такой мощный сюжет до Half-Life  я не встречал нигде и  очень печально когда понимаешь что разработчики забили болт на игру и на фанатов что принесли им славу и известность!

Теперь Valve волнуют только деньги и ничего больше. 

Последняя нормальная игра в серии.

Что делать чтобы ничего не делать © 2017 Valve Corporation

This game came out over ten years ago and I still fire it up and try to keep my mind fresh of what exactly happened in Episode 2, just in case we're ever surprised with a resolution to a story that last ended with a garden gnome being rocketed into space. Until we receive such a sequel, from this year on, I will continue to write in a nomination for this game to the "Most Deserving of a Sequel" award of the annual Steam Awards write-in category.
Well what can I say. If you get a steam account get this game. It is amazing and beautiful
